question: Employers should give longer holidays to employees to encourage them to do their job well.do you agree?
text: Nowadays a considerable number of people practise little if any sport next to their job. As a consequence, they suffer from more health problems or diseases.

One of the most obvious reasons of living a sedentary life is that many people have a desk job and due to this, people tend to get used to sitting all day. Moreover, a chair which is not designed well can cause severe backache if it is used on a daily basis, which understandably shies working people away from moving.

Another contributory factor that leads to lack of exercise is the busy schedule an employee may have. After a long weekday people are not motivated to start exercising, as they only wish to take rest and relax. Also on weekends, there are several other activities that attract people living in our modern era way more than go for a run. For instance, social networking platforms, TV or video games all provide more tempting experience, just to mention a few.
